questions.question_text: Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā _____ par, Navkhaṇḍ dharatīmā Swāmī, chhatrāyā chāle rāj… Akshar ṭek
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā avani par...

questions.question_text: Avani par āvī vahāle, _____ sthāpyo, Hari janoṇe kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj… Akshar 1
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: Avani par āvī vahāle, satsang sthāpyo...

questions.question_text: Pānche vartamān pāḷe, bāīo ne bhāīo, Hari jan sangāthe kīdhī _____ sagāīo rāj… Akshar 2
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: Hari jan sangāthe kīdhī sācī sagāīo rāj...

questions.question_text: Devnā Dev vahālo, dhāmnā Dhāmī, Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām _____ Swāmī rāj… Akshar 4
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: Pragaṭ Prabhunu nām Sahajānand Swāmī rāj...

questions.question_text: “Ane satsangī paṇ ene ja kahīe; kem je, satyarūp evo je potāno ātmā tathā satyarūp evā je Bhagwān teno jene āvī rīte sang thayo tene satsangī kahīe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Gadhada અંત્ય 39.

questions.question_text: “Trīs lakṣhaṇe yukta evā je sant teno je sang te man-karma-vachane rākhe, to jeṭalā kalyāṇne arthe sādhan chhe teṭalā sarve tenā sangmā āvī jāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is directly from Vachanamrut Vartal 4.

questions.question_text: Sant samāgam kīje, ho _____. Mān tajī santanke mukhse, prem sudhāras pīje… Ho 1
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: Sant samāgam kīje, ho nishdin...

questions.question_text: _____ kapaṭ meṭke apnā, le unku mann dīje… Ho 2
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: Antar kapaṭ meṭke apnā...

questions.question_text: Bhav-dukh ṭaḷe baḷe sab duṣhkṛut, sabvidhi _____ sījē… Ho 3
questions.explanation: The kirtan states: sabvidhi kāraj sījē… Ho 3

questions.question_text: Sācho maḷyo chhe satsang, ange achaḷ karī rākhjo re; Rakhe chaḍe bījāno _____, evu ḍahāpaṇ dūr nākhjo re… ṭek
questions.explanation: The Chosath Padi states: Rakhe chaḍe bījāno rang...
